material: steel with black matte/powder coat finish, plastic/rubber grip, metal hardware
usage: Used as a handle attachment on cable machines for upper body exercises such as pulldowns, pressdowns, rows, curls, and other cable-based movements.
key_features: Matte black cable machine attachment handle
Easily attaches to any cable machine
Coated with a black matte powder coat finish to protect from rust and increase longevity
Designed for upper body exercises including pushdowns, pressdowns, rows, and curls
Helps build biceps, triceps, grip, lats, shoulders, and core
Modern, striking design that matches home gym aesthetics
ai_description: A black, curved cable machine handle with textured dual grip areas and a sleek matte finish connects to gym cables via a silver metal carabiner and U-bolt hardware. The solid steel bar and rubberized grip create a sturdy, modern attachment suited for various cable exercises.
target_audience: Home and commercial gym users, fitness enthusiasts, and strength trainers looking to add versatile cable attachments for upper body workouts.
product_name: KAKSS Cable Machine Attachments Black Matte Anchor Bar Handle
